pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, June 14, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Brussels, Belgium

Private meetings.

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Latvia, Egils Levits.

Room CR04, Ground Floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Brussels Forum panel discussion as part of NATO 2030, with the Prime Minister of Estonia, Kaja Kallas.

Media can register to watch the event via the following link: https://brusselsforum.org

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Secretary General of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO), Jens Stoltenberg.

Bilateral Room 1, Ground Floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the NATO leaders welcoming ceremony.

Public Square Entrance
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcaster

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the North Atlantic Council meeting.

Room 1, Ground Floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcaster (for opening remarks only)

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez.

Room CR04, Ground Floor
NATO Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the European Council, Charles Michel, and the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen.

Salon du Président, 11th floor
Council of the European Union
Europa Building

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Canada-European Union plenary meeting.

European Council Room, 11th Floor
Council of the European Union
Europa Building

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
